roleset.name: wave weapons
roleset.note: BRANDISH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'brandish' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from brandish.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: not necessarily a weapon
example.text: As the rally gained strength at 3:15 p.m., he smiled broadly, brandished his unlit cigar and slapped Stanley Shopkorn, his top stock trader, on the back.
example.arg: As the rally gained strength at 3:15 p.m.
